synopsis.text: Though indifferent to her peers and solely focused on academic excellence, Shizuku Mizutani's life takes an unexpected turn when she encounters the notorious Haru Yoshida, a boy known for his violent outbursts and prolonged absence from school. Tasked with delivering class notes to him, Shizuku finds herself unwittingly drawn into Haru's world, as he proclaims her as his friend and confesses his love for her. Despite his intimidating reputation, Haru's kind-hearted nature and innocence about human relationships begin to thaw Shizuku's icy demeanor. As they navigate the complexities of friendship and love, Shizuku and Haru embark on a journey of self-discovery, learning to understand their own emotions and the world around them. Will Shizuku reciprocate Haru's feelings, or will she remain steadfast in her solitary pursuit of academic success? Join them in this heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
